languages.text: "Сколько уже вахт я ищу тени, облаченные в алое? Жажду... раскаяться в грехах... очищения праведной карой. Но нет ответа. Я проклят?"

traits.locale_text: "Сколько уже вахт я ищу тени, облаченные в алое? Жажду... раскаяться в грехах... очищения праведной карой. Но нет ответа. Я проклят?"

languages.text: "I've spent many watches searching for shadows clad in scarlet. I yearn... to repent of my weakness... to be cleansed by holy punishment. But there is no answer. Am I cursed?"
languages.original_text: "Сколько уже вахт я ищу тени, облаченные в алое? Жажду... раскаяться в грехах... очищения праведной карой. Но нет ответа. Я проклят?"

traits.locale_text: "I've spent many watches searching for shadows clad in scarlet. I yearn... to repent of my weakness... to be cleansed by holy punishment. But there is no answer. Am I cursed?"
"I've spent so many watches searching for shadows dressed in scarlet. Why have they vanished? Are we cursed?"
"I've spent many watches searching for shadows clad in scarlet. I yearn... to repent of my weakness... to be cleansed by holy punishment. But there is no answer. Am I cursed?"
"I've spent many watches searching the shadows for any sign of scarlet. Why have the weavers vanished? Are we cursed?"
"I've spent many watches searching for shadows clad in scarlet. I yearn... to repent of my weakness... to be cleansed by holy punishment. But there is no answer. Am I cursed?"
"I've spent many watches searching for shadows clad in scarlet. I yearn... to repent of my weakness... to be cleansed by holy punishment. But there is no answer. Am I cursed?"
"I've spent many watches searching for shadows clad in scarlet. I yearn... to repent of my weakness... to be cleansed by holy punishment. But there is no answer. Am I cursed?"
"I've spent many watches searching for shadows clad in scarlet. I yearn... to repent of my weakness... to be cleansed by holy punishment. But there is no answer. Am I cursed?"

languages.text: « J'ai passé bon nombre de mes tours de garde à chercher d'éventuelles ombres vêtues d'écarlate. Je brûle... de racheter ma faiblesse... de purifier mon âme par le châtiment divin. Mais j'ai beau faire, personne ne répond à mes prières. Serais-je victime d'une malédiction ? »
languages.original_text: "I've spent many watches searching for shadows clad in scarlet. I yearn... to repent of my weakness... to be cleansed by holy punishment. But there is no answer. Am I cursed?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai passé bon nombre de mes tours de garde à chercher d'éventuelles ombres vêtues d'écarlate. Je brûle... de racheter ma faiblesse... de purifier mon âme par le châtiment divin. Mais j'ai beau faire, personne ne répond à mes prières. Serais-je victime d'une malédiction ? »

languages.text: «Llevo muchas guardias buscando sombras cubiertas de escarlata. Anhelo... escapar de mi debilidad... limpiarme mediante castigo santo. Pero no me responden. ¿Me han maldecido?».
languages.original_text: "I've spent many watches searching for shadows clad in scarlet. I yearn... to repent of my weakness... to be cleansed by holy punishment. But there is no answer. Am I cursed?"

traits.locale_text: «Llevo muchas guardias buscando sombras cubiertas de escarlata. Anhelo... escapar de mi debilidad... limpiarme mediante castigo santo. Pero no me responden. ¿Me han maldecido?».

languages.text: “我花了好几巡时间，在阴影中寻找那些浑身血色的信徒。我渴望……为我的软弱而忏悔……渴望神圣的惩罚净化我的罪孽，可我却没有找到答案。我是被诅咒了吗？”
languages.original_text: "I've spent many watches searching for shadows clad in scarlet. I yearn... to repent of my weakness... to be cleansed by holy punishment. But there is no answer. Am I cursed?"

traits.locale_text: “我花了好几巡时间，在阴影中寻找那些浑身血色的信徒。我渴望……为我的软弱而忏悔……渴望神圣的惩罚净化我的罪孽，可我却没有找到答案。我是被诅咒了吗？”

languages.text: 「私は緋色をまとった影を探し求め、幾度となく時を過ごしてきた。私が強く願うのは自分の弱さを悔い改めること…。聖なる罰によって清められたい。だが、答えは返ってこない。私は呪われているのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "I've spent many watches searching for shadows clad in scarlet. I yearn... to repent of my weakness... to be cleansed by holy punishment. But there is no answer. Am I cursed?"

traits.locale_text: 「私は緋色をまとった影を探し求め、幾度となく時を過ごしてきた。私が強く願うのは自分の弱さを悔い改めること…。聖なる罰によって清められたい。だが、答えは返ってこない。私は呪われているのでしょうか？」

languages.text: "Ich habe in zahllosen Wachen scharlachrot gewandete Schatten gesucht. Ich wollte ... meiner Schwäche entsagen ... mittels heiliger Bestrafung gereinigt werden. Aber es gibt keine Antwort. Bin ich verflucht?"
languages.original_text: "I've spent many watches searching for shadows clad in scarlet. I yearn... to repent of my weakness... to be cleansed by holy punishment. But there is no answer. Am I cursed?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe in zahllosen Wachen scharlachrot gewandete Schatten gesucht. Ich wollte ... meiner Schwäche entsagen ... mittels heiliger Bestrafung gereinigt werden. Aber es gibt keine Antwort. Bin ich verflucht?"

languages.text: "Kan kızılına bürünmüş gölgeleri ararken pek çok vardiya harcadım. Zayıflığımdan dolayı tövbe etmeye... Kutsal hükümle arınmaya... Hasret duyuyorum. Ama yanıtlarımı bulamıyorum. Lanetli miyim ben?"
languages.original_text: "I've spent many watches searching for shadows clad in scarlet. I yearn... to repent of my weakness... to be cleansed by holy punishment. But there is no answer. Am I cursed?"
